table.name: vtiger_anpaymentprofile
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_anpaymentprofile` ( `anpaymentprofileid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `anpaymentprofile_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `account_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `an_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `customer_profile_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `customer_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `firstname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `lastname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `state` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zip` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `country` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `phone_number` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_number` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `card_number` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL, `expiration_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `card_code` varchar(4) DEFAULT NULL, `account_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `routing_number` varchar(9) DEFAULT NULL, `account_number` varchar(17) DEFAULT NULL, `name_on_account` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `e_check_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bank_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `payment_method` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `is_primary` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_anpaymentprofilecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_anpaymentprofilecf` ( `anpaymentprofileid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`anpaymentprofileid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `valid` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: vtiger_anpaymentprofile
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_anpaymentprofile` ADD INDEX `account_id_index` (`account_id`) USING BTREE ;
